Title: Verify Show/Hide password control availability
Pre conditions: User is on Reset Password page
Steps (Step):
1. Navigate to Reset Password page
2. Observe the New password field
3. Observe the Confirm password field
Steps (Expected Result):
1. Both New password and Confirm password fields should have Show/Hide password toggle (eye icon)
2. Toggle icon should be placed inside the input field and right-aligned
3. Toggle should use standard eye/eye-off icon

Title: Verify default state of password fields
Pre conditions: User is on Reset Password page
Steps (Step):
1. Load the Reset Password page
2. Enter password in New password field
3. Enter password in Confirm password field
Steps (Expected Result):
1. Both password fields should be in masked state by default
2. Entered password should be hidden
3. Password should be displayed as dots/asterisks

Title: Verify password visibility toggle functionality
Pre conditions: User is on Reset Password page with passwords entered
Steps (Step):
1. Click Show password toggle on New password field
2. Click Hide password toggle
3. Click Show password toggle on Confirm password field
4. Click Hide password toggle
Steps (Expected Result):
1. Password text should be revealed in plain text
2. Password should be masked again
3. Password text should be revealed in plain text
4. Password should be masked again

Title: Verify toggle state persistence
Pre conditions: User is on Reset Password page with passwords visible
Steps (Step):
1. Show passwords using toggle
2. Refresh the page
3. Check password field states
Steps (Expected Result):
1. Passwords should be visible
2. Page should reload
3. Password fields should be in masked state

Title: Verify accessibility requirements
Pre conditions: User is on Reset Password page
Steps (Step):
1. Tab through password fields and toggles
2. Use screen reader
3. Try keyboard controls
Steps (Expected Result):
1. All elements should be keyboard accessible
2. Screen reader should properly announce password fields and toggle states
3. Toggle should work with keyboard controls

Title: Verify toggle behavior with multiple password fields
Pre conditions: User is on Reset Password page
Steps (Step):
1. Show password in New password field
2. Check Confirm password field state
3. Hide password in New password field
Steps (Expected Result):
1. Only New password field should show plain text
2. Confirm password field should remain masked
3. New password field should be masked again
